name: Praveen Das

company.name: Open Source - Lead Partnership Manager South Asia - Wikimedia Foundation

bio: Praveen Das is a seasoned technologist with deep expertise in the realm of open-source AI models. As an advocate for democratizing AI, Praveen has delivered insightful talks on powerful frameworks like Gemma, TensorFlow, and other open-source tools. With a strong belief in the potential of collaborative development, his sessions focus on empowering developers to leverage these technologies for real-world applications. Praveenâ€™s work underscores his passion for making cutting-edge AI accessible to all, inspiring developers and innovators to explore the frontiers of artificial intelligence.

name: Anubhav Singh
bio: IT graduate served fresh with a delicious topping of web development and machine learning, flavored strongly with love for fast growing startups. Recommended to be taken as a main course, doesn't quite fit in as side dish. Could have been a stand up comedian but was already committed to computers, so stayed (is a total keeper)

name: Pankaj Rai
bio: Pankaj Rai is a Google Developer Expert for Android & Firebase with extensive experience in mobile app development. He specializes in native Android development, creating scalable apps with modern technologies like Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, AAC, and Coroutines. His expertise extends to Machine Learning integration, Augmented Reality with ARCore, and Flutter development. Pankaj is an early adopter of Kotlin and has created open-source libraries including Stories, JetToast, and JetFirestore. He actively contributes to the developer community through articles, YouTube tutorials on his channel "All Techies", and speaking at tech events.

name: Gaurav Kheterpal
bio: Gaurav Kheterpal is a Google Developer Expert in AI (2025) and a Multi-Cloud Enterprise Architect with 25+ years of experience in strategic account management and product development. He is a Salesforce MVP Hall of Fame inductee, MuleSoft Ambassador, and Trailblazer with an impressive certification portfolio including 45x Salesforce Certs, 23x Accredited Professional Certs, 4x MuleSoft Certs, 3x Google Certs, and AWS certification. Gaurav is a seasoned speaker who has presented at major events including Dreamforce, TrailheadDX, SF World Tour, and India Dreamin', sharing insights on cutting-edge technologies and scaling enterprise solutions.

name: Nitin Tiwari

company.name: Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning

bio: Hello, I am Nitin Tiwari, Senior Data Scientist at Zelar and a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning. I have 4+ years of experience in AI/ML, specializing in developing end-to-end pipelines for applications focused on Computer Vision, NLP, LLMs, and Generative AI. My expertise includes GCP, Vertex AI, fine-tuning LLMs, and deploying ML models. I am passionate about contributing to the open-source community and regularly share projects, blogs, and articles on GitHub and Medium. Notable contributions include projects and examples I've developed for the official TensorFlow.js and Gemma Cookbook repositories that have been highlighted in these repositories, as well as contributions to the Google Dev Library. If you think I can help you, let's connect and talk.

name: Shruti Tiwari
bio: Shruti Tiwari is a strategic leader with 9+ years of experience in B2B SaaS eCommerce, specializing in product marketing, brand building, and GTM strategies. As a Google Women Techmakers Ambassador, I Am Remarkable Facilitator (Platinum Tier), GTM Ambassador, and Grammarly Ambassador, she empowers growth and innovation. Shruti has collaborated with industry leaders like Meta, Walmart, Amazon, eBay, and TikTok, successfully launching products and leading impactful marketing campaigns. She has led teams of 60+ professionals and is a dynamic speaker who delivers insights through global webinars and speaking engagements for major tech brands.
